# Connecting via USB

## For Customers Using iOS

An Apple Lightning to USB Camera Adapter is required.

!Connection Diagram

1. Set the cameraâ€™s **CONNECTION SETTING > USB POWER SUPPLY SETTING** to OFF.

2. Connect the camera and smartphone using a USB cable. Launch the Photos app to import photos and movies to your smartphone.

> ðŸ’¡ **Note:**  
> The desired results cannot be achieved with a USB Type-C-to-Lightning cable. Use a camera adapter.
